description:
A pack that allows you to obtain 21 pieces of BGM from the ω-Force 20th Anniversary Concert.

■Content
 `DYNASTY WARRIORS`
 `CYCLONIZED TYPHOON`
 `SLASH THE DEMON`
 `ARENA`
 `SLASH IT; THRASH ALL`
 `GREAT RED SPIRIT`
 `Anegawa`
 `Kawanakajima`
 `Tadakatsu Honda's Theme`
 `Komaki-Nagakute`
 `Tetorigawa`
 `A Fighting Chance`
 `Demon Slayers`
 `Chthonian Fiend`
 `Pyropteryx`
 `Wingspawn`
 `Raging Inferno`
 `THE WALL OF FATE~ God of War~The Heroes' Advance`
 `THEME OF OROCHI -REBIRTH MIX-`
 `City of Flowers`
 `Crush'em All`
name: ω-Force 20th Anniversary Concert BGM Pack
